rows.name: Software Engineering Experience and Knowledge
cells: Some experience of software
At least 1 year software engineering and/or Internal Auditor and/or Process Engineer experience.
At least 3 years software engineering and/or Internal Auditor and/or Process Engineer experience.
At least 5 years software engineering and/or Internal Auditor and/or Process Engineer experience, and ability to train and coach employees in quality assurance area.

At least 7 years software engineering and at least 3 years PM experience and successfully completed at least 2 projects and/or Internal Auditor and/or Process Engineer experience, and ability to train and coach employees in quality assurance area.

rows.name: Software Process Knowledge
cells: Not expected to have knowledge or experience of processes
Expected to be able to follow and understand defined processes
Expected to be able to follow, understand, and enhance the defined processes
Expected to be able to follow, understand, actively influence and enhance the defined processes
Expected to be able to define processes

rows.name: Design and Documentation Skills
cells: Able to read and understand project, requirement and process documentation
Able to read and understand project, requirement and process documentation; able to create internal audit documentation and reports
Able to read and understand project, requirement and process documentation; able to create high-quality internal audit reports, project documentation and reports
Able to read and understand project, requirement and process documentation; able to create high-quality internal audit reports, project documentation and reports
Able to read and understand project, requirement and process documentation; able to create high-quality internal audit reports, project documentation and reports

rows.name: Job Titles
cells:
Junior Process Engineer;

Associate Quality Assurance Analyst;

Staffing Assistant

Process Engineer;

Quality Assurance Analyst;

Staffing Specialist

Senior Process Engineer;

Senior Quality Assurance Analyst;

Senior Staffing Specialist

Lead Process Engineer;

Lead Quality Assurance Analyst;

Lead Staffing Specialist

Chief Process Engineer;

Chief Quality Assurance Analyst;

Chief Staffing Specialist

rows.name: Roles Played on a Project
cells: Plays the Process Engineer and Auditor roles
Plays the Process Engineer, Auditor and Process Engineer roles
Plays the Process Engineer, Auditor, Process Engineer and Reviewer roles
Plays the Process Engineer, Auditor, Process Engineer and Reviewer roles, and usually also performs a Team Lead, Process Trainer or Lead Auditor role
Can play any role, typically a senior position. Responsibilities can include Team Lead, Reviewer, Lead Auditor, Process Trainer and Process Engineer

rows.name: Reliability
cells: Expected to work effectively under supervision
Expected to work effectively without direct supervision
Expected to be self-managing and work effectively without supervision
Expected to be self-managing, work effectively without supervision and supervise the work of other Auditors and Process Engineers
Expected to work independently without direct supervision and to supervise the work of other Lead Auditors and Process Engineers

rows.name: Quality
cells: Must show a sense of responsibility for the quality of the deliverables created by him/her.
Creates deliverables in good Process Engineer quality
Must be a role model for colleagues; creates deliverables in high quality
Must be a role model for colleagues, on a par with the best industry standards; creates deliverables in excellent quality
Must be a role model for colleagues, on a par with the best industry standards; creates deliverables in excellent quality

rows.name: Customer Relations
cells: Not expected to deal directly with Customers
Expected to participate in phone conferences; be interviewed by customers; visit customers with supervision
Expected to participate in phone conferences; be interviewed by customers; visit customers with supervision
Expected to participate in phone conferences; be interviewed by customers; be involved in customer workshops and presentations; visit customers without supervision

Expected to be on a par with the best industry experts in customer relationship skills; participate in phone conferences; be interviewed by customers; be involved in customer workshops and presentations; visit customers without supervision

rows.name: Language Level in the Customer's Communication Language
cells: Able to read and write the Customer's Communication Language
Able to read and write the Customer's Communication Language and have some speaking ability
Comfortably able to read, write and speak the Customer's Communication Language
Comfortably able to read, write and speak the Customer's Communication Language; able to write high-quality unambiguous texts
Totally fluent in the spoken and written variants of the Customer's Communication Language; able to write high-quality unambiguous texts
